contest-event.event-date: March 23, 1957 D Midlands Area (Championship Section) Midlands Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Championship Themes from Symphony no. 9 [Beethoven] Albert Hall, Nottingham, Nottinghamshire, England, UK First Prize: Daily Herald Area Challenge Trophy and £50 Second Prize: The Munn & Felton Trophy and £30 Third Prize: The Creswell Trophy and £15 May 3, 2011, 5:47 p.m. March 27, 2020, 1:51 p.m. 1 The GUS Band Harry Mortimer 2 Creswell Colliery Band George Thompson 3 Ransome Band Eric Ball 4 Rushden Windmill Band George Willcocks Unknown Result City of Coventry Cyril Yorath Unknown Result Ferodo Works Band George Hespe Unknown Result Jaguar Land Rover Band Jack Major Unknown Result Revo Works Harry Heyes Unknown Result Sankey's Castle Works Tom Francis
